mapper.sql: id , role_char, `name`, remarks, create_time, updated_time, is_deleted
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_role WHERE is_deleted = FALSE
AND `name` LIKE CONCAT(#{q.name}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT
FROM sys_role WHERE is_deleted = FALSE AND `name` = #{name}

SELECT t1.id, t1.role_char, t1.`name`, t1.remarks, t1.create_time, t1.updated_time FROM sys_role t1, sys_user_role t2, sys_user t3 WHERE t3.is_deleted = FALSE AND t3.uid = #{uid} AND t3.uid = t2.uid AND t2.role_id = t1.id
